content: format this crochet pattern will instruct you on how to crochet a character of the animated film the octonauts this pattern is in pdf format and is 19 pages of detailed instructions that include photos for reference to guide you through the process of making your toy ……………………………………………………………………… ……… language and terms english us terms this pattern uses us crochet terms and is only available in english ……………………………………………………………………… ……… skill level intermediate ……………………………………………………………………………… materials 1 yarn weight fingering or super fine yarn white blue dark blue black orange yellow pink gray 2 suitable for the size of a yarn hook 3 fiberfill 4 sewing needles 5 felt pieces black white beige yellow red blue 6 glue
